title: Free G-Type font at Fontworks UK
content:
Fontworks UK Ltd are offering a free download of Sovereign Regular. I wouldn't use it for text, but it can look quite distinctive as a display face for headings etc.

[Sovereign Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015001834/http:/www.type.co.uk/index.php?p=FreeFonts)
author: Nick Cooke

comments.content: Nick-- thanks for the heads-up and I hope this drums up some business for you.
